question.subject: Urgent: Account Suspension
question.content: Dear {username}, your account will be suspended due to suspicious activity. Click here to verify your account: http://phishingsite.com/Verify Now
question.mcq: What indicates this email might be phishing?

mcq_options.option: Urgent subject line and request for action
mcq_options.tooltip: This is a strong indicator of phishing, as urgent requests can create a false sense of urgency.
This doesn't necessarily indicate phishing, as sender emails can be easily spoofed.
Personalized greetings don't guarantee legitimacy, as phishers can use publicly available information.
Security-related subjects can be used by phishers to create a sense of urgency.

answers: Click here to verify your account: http://phishingsite.com/Verify Now
your account will be suspended due to suspicious activity

question.subject: Security Update: Download Now
question.content: Dear {username}, download our latest security update: http://malwaresite.com/Download Now
question.mcq: What raises suspicion about this email?

mcq_options.option: Request to download software from unknown source
mcq_options.tooltip: Downloading software from unknown sources can lead to malware infections.
An official-looking sender email doesn't guarantee the download is safe.
Personalized greetings don't ensure the email is legitimate.
Security-related subjects can be used to disguise malicious downloads.

answers: download our latest security update: http://malwaresite.com/Download Now
